overview_of_class: Students in this introductory course learn techniques of rhetorical analysis that assist them in describing, evaluating, and participating in discussions of public issues. Historical and contemporary examples of public discourse illuminate the ways that symbolic action affects decision-making and power relations in public life.
name: Principles of Rhetorical Criticism
title: SoC COMM_ST 215-0-20 Principles of Rhetorical Criticism
